website_summaries.verdict: An attractively-priced tool that both buffs your skins and helps to clear pores.
pros: Effective at buffing skin and removing oil
Tip made with laser-cut diamonds for skin resurfacing
Includes multiple tips for targeting congested facial pores
cons: A handful of customers had problems charging the unit
Tip tends to shed some of the crystals unit uses to treat skin

customer_reviews.title: I really like this tool.
customer_reviews.text: Finally brought one of these. Did a lot of research and felt this one was the best for the money. No reviews on Amazon yet but lots of good reviews on Target. I haven't been disappointed! Can wait to fade some of these acne scars. And keep this skin clean
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea King

customer_reviews.title: Not good for your money
customer_reviews.text: So, I originally thought this was great, but after 3 uses the top of the diamond crystals completely fell off! So it’s no good anymore
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Ayoub

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this device based on the reviews and the price. I am not disappointed! I love the gentle diamond tip as well as the included suction tips. You must understand releasing the sebum or trapped dirt and oil from your pores takes time. By the second use I cleaned the tip and found a lot of dirt and oil. With continued use I noticed cleaner pores, smoother skin and I’m hoping for less breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: Erica N

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and I don't feel it removed my black heads too well but what it did do is remove all the excess grease and opened up my pores so it helped me truly clean my face when I did my night time skin care. I think this is a great took to clean up spots on your face that have black heads because it removes so much excess oil that looks so gross coming out but your skin feels so clean. I love that its chargeable and portable and it has different suction cup sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I followed the reviews of steaming my face first, however, I didn't see much results as far as the suction. Clearly wasn't worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 2 of these now and they do not turn on. I plug them in, the blue charging light turns on, then a few minutes later it turns off and nothing happens. I thought maybe I just got a bad one, no big deal right? But 2 being bad...what are the chances?
customer_reviews.author: LMAD

customer_reviews.title: Nice skin conditioning tool
customer_reviews.text: Very efficiently and easy to use! Takes a couple times to get the hang of it but make skin feel great instantly. Looking clear and smoother too
customer_reviews.author: Damon Pechacek

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't remove blackheads and might as well sandpaper your face
customer_reviews.text: This device sucked hard enough to break capillaries on my nose but doesn't pull out blackheads. It might remove a few loose surface flakes but that's it. As for the exfoliation, you might as well rub sandpaper on your face. It's a coarse, rough head with suction (no rotation or movement). UPDATE: two days after using for the first time I have a giant triple-headed cyst the size of a dime on my cheek. I never get cysts. This is not strong enough to pull blackheads but is strong enough to rupture pore walls! AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy lawyer

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY - DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I received my Pore Suction Tool and made sure to charge it overnight (12 hours per the directions). The next day, I went to use it and it only worked for 30 seconds before it powered off. I thought maybe I didn't charge it right, so I plugged it back in so it would charge overnight and made sure the blue battery light was showing. This morning, I tried to use it and it crapped out after 5 seconds. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine Freeman

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly. Light waight. Takes "12 hrs at 1st to " fully charge" I suppose I could of unplugged it sooner. Just didnt. Came with all items disrupted. I like the diamond head dosnt seem to tare my skin up. Came with way more than 10 filters ( that's a bonus ). I tryes some other head they worked as well.my only dislike and I'm not so sure it's a con because I just dont know, but the suction even on highest setting isnt that strong. I'm looking to " suck the black heads away ". But for the price its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good for blackheads not resurfacing
customer_reviews.text: This is really worth it for the amount of sebum and dead skin that it gets out of my skin. I have very deep pores and it does a good job. Paired with a face steamer the blackhead part is amazing. If you're going more for the resurfacing that part is a little more dissatisfying. It's just a "diamond" head that looks like sparkles. Just scrapes your skin roughly with it. It looks completely dull after I used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Josias

customer_reviews.title: Great suction device for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised with how great this works. The suction power is really good. I like the different heads you need for different areas on your face. I do wish there was a smaller one minus the one for your nose. Also, I wish the filters were white inside of black. You see the dead skin, white heads, etc. but I think white will really allow you to see what you’re getting out. Lastly, sometimes what’s coming off your skin stays at the top or side of the suction and doesn’t go down to the filter. Even with those minor flaws, it’s a great device to use and has helped so far in my skin journey during quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Tried to use it again the other day and it didn’t work. Too bad I didn’t try it again before the return window close. The battery was completely charged. I’ve used this once. I look forward to figuring it out and using it more...especially since I have clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Loveeeee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have never tried one of these before and have been wanting to try one for a while now and I’m so happy I choose this one! So easy to use and comes with so many different heads to use all over the face! It has 5 different suction levels and comes with new filters and everything you need! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great results.
customer_reviews.text: The MIO Diamond Microdermabrasion is such a great tool. I actually own a similar product that cost around $300 and this works exactly the same. This device is painless to use and effective. This really helps reduce the appearance of my pores! I really love how affordable Spa Sciences is. Every tool I’ve tried from them (this is my 3rd!) has been great quality, easy to use, and makes my skin look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Elise

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this at first. I thought it would have been just lke the video. It is not. It has some benefits but not what the video portrayed. I would not buy this again. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa McNamara

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: Best product hands down. I was Skeptical at first but after using it on my husband WOW. He has large pores on his nose and works outside a lot so the stuff this Tiny little machine sucked out. And to top it off we use it every other night and I find that the pores are shrinking.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good product if you use the right technique
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It cleans well but be careful and gentle. Removes dead skin and cleans pores fairly well if you k ow how to use it and prep skin beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Ellir Ro

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this microdermabrasion/pore extraction system! I cant believe what a difference its made! :) My skin looks so much brighter, healthier, cleaner and younger! I highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This products sucks...really well
customer_reviews.text: It really worked on sucking all the gunk out of my pores. I didn’t expect it to work as well as it did.
customer_reviews.author: Safferdian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I used this product! I have always been skeptical of products like this, but it does everything that is advertised and it feels extremely high quality for the cost. I liked it so much, I used it on both my roommates and my boyfriend. 10/10 recommend. Also, be careful to not hold the tool in one spot for too long or you'll get a bruise, but they disappear within a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jesslynn Frey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results that feel and look amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I was extremely pleased and surprised how well this works! Very powerful for the size, easy to use and clean. Best of all the results are so noticable my friends asked me how I look 10 years younger overnight, after just one use of this product! After using it I feel like I had an expensive facial at a spa!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Find other option
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use however the suction power is not that so good.
customer_reviews.author: Andre A.

customer_reviews.title: Super good for clearing skin
customer_reviews.text: Helps take off the ugly real nice. And the suction is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Good suction power! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I just used it and I already love it! Even the color is super cute. The suction power is amazing. It really works on my face type (oily). A good recommendation: use it after clean your face with warm water, or you can also use (like I did) a facial sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Needs more suction
customer_reviews.text: This tool didn’t do anything for the blackheads. However the diamond crystal abrasion tip has been great for improving the texture of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brandezzy

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: The suctions doesn’t seem strong enough to remove blackheads. It didn’t remove mine.
customer_reviews.author: TEQUILA LEE

customer_reviews.title: No charging cord for “rechargeable” device.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the USB charging cord that is said to be included in the packaging. I am very disappointed because now there is no way to use this product. My only option is to return it. 1 star only because it made me pick one.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Charge
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it wouldn't charge. I requested a replacement be sent to me and that one didn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole H

customer_reviews.title: was impressed at first
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I absolutely loved it! It did wonders for my face. That being said, after the first use it no longer holds a charge. I have charged it for hours, even days to avail. So basically useless now.
customer_reviews.author: DentalBabe9917

customer_reviews.title: DEFECT- NEVER WOULD CHARGE (NOT HAPPY)
customer_reviews.text: Never use because it would never charge, so I put it back in the box and shipped it back. This is the second microdermabrasion (Vanity Planet Expora) product that wouldn't charge that I purchase off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for when you can't get facials!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product. I enjoy using this so that I can exfoliate my face. The only downfall is that it does not feel very sturdy so I'm unsure if it would survive a drop.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I made this year! Fantastic results after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product I am so glad I bought! Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective for at home use
customer_reviews.text: For 30$ very good suction, don’t expect spa material but definitely does make a big difference after a couple times, my pores are so much smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I Love THIS!!!! Definitely worth my money. I watched some videos at first to understand how to use it and yeaaah...
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Did not work have to return it
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I put it on a charge it Hass to charge for 12 hours and it won’t charge I have to return it
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I expected it to be. I would buy the game.
customer_reviews.author: CECIL ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Its works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works like a dream and clears your face of the dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: Simran

customer_reviews.title: Definitely smoothed my skin
customer_reviews.text: Not so sure about removing blackheads, however, it did resurface my skin somewhat. I guess I expected a little more from the rave reviews others have left. It is easy to use. Suction is good. I'll try it a couple more times.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi A. Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I was weary at first reading some reviews that these devices leave bruising and hickey marks... as long as you don’t go crazy you should be fine. My pores were blocked from a spray tan last week so I decided to give this a try bc exfoliating just doesn’t do the job. I had a facial in a spa once that used a product like this. The key is keeping the speed down and constantly moving in small areas at a time. Don’t let it sit on your skin. After two uses in 24 hours I see a difference in how clean my pores look.
customer_reviews.author: ceecee17

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, I find the shape awkward at times , otherwise it’s fine
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Mendocilla

customer_reviews.title: Device is too thick to hold.
customer_reviews.text: I personally do not like it and I don't recommend it, is not ergonimic. it feels odd when you try to do the forehead area. I used it twice but is too thick to hold. I would like to return it but I am afraid I may not get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: indi rangel

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. Hardly any suction. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this so far. I’ve used it once but really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

product_meta.title: Spa Sciences MIO Diamond Microdermabrasion Blackhead Remover, Pore Suction Tool–Rechargeable-Dermatologist Recommended Skin Resurfacing System for Anti-Aging-Exfoliator for Acne Scars/Wrinkles
feature_bullets: IMPROVE PORE SIZE – Gently and effectively remove dead skin and rough texture to improve softness, smoothness, radiance, fine lines, skin tone and enlarged pores.
SMOOTHER SKIN – Expert rejuvenation thanks to laser-cut diamonds leaves skin instantly feeling smoother and softer. It removes dead skin and rough dry patches with professional grade exfoliation.

SUCTION EXTRACTION TIPS – Multiple tips in different shapes and sizes let you easily remove unwanted pore congestion, These tips are designed to be used in easy to reach places like the chin, cheeks and forehead.
ERGONOMIC HANDLE – Along with the patented skin resurfacing technology and 5 speed and power settings, the sleek handle design allows for comfort and easy use on your face.

100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Put your worries aside! If you don't like the Spa Sciences MIO microdermabrasion system for any reason, you can just take advantage of our 4 month guarantee! We will replace it or give you your money back for any reason. NO QUESTIONS ASKED! Email customerservice@spasciences.com. There’s a reason why Spa Sciences is in every major US retailer; we are the only brand offering prestige beauty tools under $30.
